item.title: Initial Vision
item.description: As an occasional runner/hiker/biker, I like to explore new roads, new ways. Friends and family are sometimes a bit scarred: where have you been? We tried to call you but your phone was on mute… What if they could simply check where I am via an easy to use website or application?
